SEARCH
程序包 si.display

类 PlayerListener

java.lang.Object
si.display.PlayerListener
所有已实现的接口:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class PlayerListener extends Object implements KeyListener
The PlayerListener class implements KeyListener to handle keyboard input for player controls in the Asteroids game. It tracks the state of keys associated with player movement, firing, and pausing.
